Is it time for the meal?
Answer: It is time.
Instruct the disciples:
If you are a filial child,
Do not disobey my words and teachings.
I am going to do something great.
After I leave,
Do not frown.
Do not be like the worldly ones.
Do not practice.
Those who cry and frown
are not my disciples.
Crying is a worldly dharma.
The Buddha Dharma is not like this.
Free from all characteristics,
this is seeing the Buddha.
After speaking, he suddenly sat and passed away.
The Great Master was sixty-one years old.
